channel.title: Declarations on Marco Epsilon
channel.description: Recent content in Declarations on Marco Epsilon

item.title: Attribute specifier sequence
item.description: Overview Attribute specifier sequence(Since C++11)的引入是为了指定type, object, code等实现定义的属性。      [[attr]] [[attr1, attr2, attr3(arg)]] [[namespace::attr(arg)]] alignas_specifier 形式化地,语法应该如下: .tmp_note_table { padding:0px 0px; border:none; margin:4px 0px; width:auto; } .tmp_note_row td { border:none; }
